plurals.name: first_duplicate_will_be_updated
plurals.item: If you choose to update existing sound, and multiple instances of it exist, only the first one will be updated.
If you choose to update existing sounds, and multiple instances of them exist, only the first ones will be updated.

plurals.name: sound_already_exists
plurals.item: Sound %1$s already exists in the database. Do you want to update the existing sound, add a duplicate, or skip it?
Some sounds already exist in the database. Do you want to update the existing sounds, add duplicates, or skip them?
